EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Fey Favor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Magical Training Feat. Each core ability including this one grants +6 Ranged power, +50 Spellpoints, and +5 Force and Universal Spell Power. In addition, this grants you a +1 Epic Bonus to Spell DCs. Only the Highest Epic Bonus to Spell DCs you get from Destiny Cores applies.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Pierce the Twilight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +5 to Attack with Ranged Weapons, +5 Spell Penetration. Your Epic Bonus to Spell DCs increases to +2.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Audience with the Queen
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Get some tea! When you Rest at a shrine, you pop off for some tea, and randomly get a beneficial effect based on the type of tea you receive. These effects last for 10 minutes. Your Epic Bonus to Spell DCs increases to +3.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Prism
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Shiradi Champion Destiny Mantle: Ranged and thrown attacks and offensive spells have a 7% chance to deal 2d10 damage to a random ability score.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Wild Magics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[30/60/100] SP. Rank 3: +5 Force and Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Shiradi Growth
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a Spell or a Ranged Attack that builds Primal Charges.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Pin
EnhancementSelection.Description: Primal Builder: Ranged Attack: +[1/2/3][W]. On hit, generate one Primal Charge. The first target hit is Slowed for 3 seconds. On Crit: The first target hit is instead Immobilized for 3 seconds. Rank 3: +1 Critical Threat and Multiplier. Cooldown: 6 seconds, CC duration 3 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fey Lights
EnhancementSelection.Description: Primal Builder: SLA: Enemies in a cone must make a save DC (20 + Highest of INT/WIS/CHA + Illusion bonuses) versus Will, Fort, and Reflex for a Daze, Stun, and Immobilize effect. On hitting at least one enemy, generate one Primal Charge. Cooldown: 6 seconds, CC duration 3 seconds. Activation Cost: 10 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Good Luck
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Luck bonus to all Saving Throws and Skills. If you have the Luck of Heroes feat, double this bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Fey Sight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Listen, Search, and Spot. Rank 3: You are immune to Blindness.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Rainbow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in your Prism Destiny Mantle, your ranged and thrown attacks and offensive spells have a 7% chance to deal 1d100 extra damage of a random type. This damage scales with 200% Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Empathetic Link
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] charges of Wild Empathy.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Shiradi Power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a Spell or Ranged Attack that expends Primal Charges.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Otto's Whistler
EnhancementSelection.Description: Primal Spender: Ranged Attack: Make a ranged attack with +[1/2/3][W]. If target is moving, it is forced to Dance for 18 seconds. In addition, on hit you deal 1d6 Force Damage per Primal Charge spent. This damage scales with Ranged Power. Cooldown: 15 Seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Beguile
EnhancementSelection.Description: Primal Spender: SLA: Target must make a Will save versus DC (20 + Highest of INT/WIS/CHA + Enchantment bonuses) to Charm a single target. Cooldown 25 seconds. +1 to the DC per Primal Charge consumed. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Activation Cost: 10 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Healing Spring
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Casts Vigor on multiple targets. A positve energy conjuration that heals 1d6 +1 per 3 caster levels (max +11 at level 33), every 2 seconds for 8 seconds. When the initial effect expires, a smaller healing effect hat heals 1 HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds is applied. Only one Vigor spell can be active at a time, with the most beneficial taking priority. If multiple Vigor spells are cast on the same target, then the duration is extended. Cooldown: 30 Seconds. Activation Cost: 1 Wild Empathy Charge. Passive: +1 Wild Empathy Charge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Phase Double
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6]% Doubleshot. Each Primal Charge grants +1% stacking incorporeality.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Double Rainbow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in your Prism Destiny Mantle, your ranged and thrown attacks and offensive spells have a 7% chance to inflict a random effect on your target. These effects scale with various different things depending on their origins, including Melee, Ranged, and Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Pierce Deception
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Watchful Eye feat. (If you pass within 5 feet of a trap, you make a Search check to notice it as if actively Searching. (You still need the Trapfinding feat to successfully Search for difficult traps.)) If you have the Watchful Eye feat, +5% Doubleshot.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Shiradi Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Spell School to Specialize in.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Vision
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your attacks have Ghost Touch and you bypass 5% dodge and fortification. If you have the Holy Strike feat, double the dodge and fortification bypass.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Elemental Absorption
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10]% elemental absorption with fire/cold/acid/electric damage. Rank 3: +1 Primal Charge cap.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Fey Form
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in your Prism Mantle, gain DR 10/Cold Iron and +5 force and universal spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Track
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Dealing damage to enemies reduces their AC by 1 and fortification by 2%. stacks 10 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Enemy of my Own
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Favored Enemy: Fey feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Whirling Wrists
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[10/20/30]% Attack Speed with Thrown Weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Step into the Wilds
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain Displacement. This effect lasts as long as the quest or until you die or it is dispelled. Resting will return it.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Nerve Venom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in your Prism Mantle: Your ranged and thrown attacks and offensive spells have a 7% chance to paralyze living creatures for 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Lore of the Hunt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Weapons gain +1 Critical Damage Multiplier on rolls of 19-20.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Control
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to all Spell DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Feywild Attunement
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Every 4 Wilderness Lore feats grant you +1% Dodge. You are always considered to be in Point Blank Shot range. +10 Force and Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Hunt's End
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your next shot with a Ranged or Thrown weapon has +400% damage. This shot has +20 to Critical Threat Range. Cooldown: 18 Seconds.
